wikipedia_page.main: Derek Gorst (1903-1981) was a British actor.

response: * Read All About It, a 1945 film featuring Derek Gorst

Incident in Shanghai is a 1938 British drama film directed by John Paddy Carstairs and starring Margaret Vyner, Patrick Barr, Ralph Roberts and Derek Gorst. It was made at Pinewood Studios as a quota quickie for release by Paramount Pictures. It was shot in eleven days on a budget of £7,000.Chibnall p.49
